A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The first time I saw it\, it kinda pissed me off.  But I could tell that it was well written\, directed and acted....it was just the character development going in a different direction than I wanted that irked me.  But on a second viewing\, and some reflection\, I've drawn my own conclusion that this is one of the greatest Star Wars movies ever made.   In fact\, I doubt they will ever make a Star Wars movie this good ever again\, because it was such a good film that it challenged people's preconceived notions.  It wasn't a \"safe\" film.   It was a amazing and challenging film.  Disney probably will force future installments to pander to the narrow minded fanbase that can't let go.
